project_metadata.description: A modern, responsive to-do application that helps users organize tasks efficiently with real-time updates and intuitive task management features.
project_metadata.core_purpose: Simplify task management by providing a clean interface for creating, tracking, and organizing daily tasks with filtering capabilities
project_metadata.target_audience: Individuals seeking an efficient digital task management solution for personal productivity
key_features: Add new tasks with titles and descriptions
Mark tasks as complete/incomplete with visual feedback
Filter tasks by status (all, active, completed)

pages.purpose: Main interface for viewing and managing all tasks with filtering options
sections: Hero Section with app title and welcome message
Task Input Form for adding new tasks
Task List displaying all tasks with status indicators
Summary Stats showing task completion metrics
pages.content_notes: The dashboard features a centered layout with a prominent task input field at the top, followed by filter buttons (All, Active, Completed) and a scrollable task list. Each task item shows checkbox, title, description preview, edit/delete buttons, and completion timestamp. Includes a progress bar showing completion percentage.

pages.purpose: Information about the TaskFlow application and its features
sections: How It Works section with step-by-step guide
pages.content_notes: Clean about page with animated feature cards, step-by-step usage instructions, and contact details. Uses iconography to represent each feature visually.

components.purpose: Form component for adding new tasks with title and description fields
Individual task card displaying task info with edit/delete actions
Filter controls for task status filtering
Summary statistics showing task completion metrics
Main navigation header with logo and menu items

apis.purpose: Retrieve all tasks for the authenticated user
